getNotifiedDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Returns the value and index of a specified notified deposit.

getRewardsLastRedeemed(address).notice: Returns the timestamp of the last time the account redeemed block rewards.

increaseNoticePeriod(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Increases the notice period for all or part of a bonded deposit.

isVoting(address).notice: Returns whether or not a specified account is voting.

isVotingFrozen(address).notice: Returns whether or not an account's voting power is frozen.

notify(uint256,uint256).notice: Notifies a bonded deposit, allowing funds to be withdrawn after the notice period.

rebond(uint256,uint256).notice: Rebonds a notified deposit, with notice period >= the remaining time to availability.

redeemRewards().notice: Redeems rewards accrued since the last redemption for the specified account.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCumulativeRewardWeight(uint256).notice: Sets the cumulative block reward for 1 unit of account weight.

setMaxNoticePeriod(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum notice period for an account.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

unfreezeVoting().notice: Unfreezes the voting power of `msg.sender`'s account.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws a notified deposit after the duration of the notice period.
